header_text: You are a dog owner. You've had difficulty with your balance lately, and you worry that it will become harder to take your dog for a walk. Thinking about whether you will be able to continue to care for your dog makes you feel overwhelmed.

elements.text: You remind yourself that your dog's love is unconditional and you can find creative ways to provide care and attention for them. This helps you to see the future more...
